verbs.description: sunday paella [ARG0: my adult children] [V: adore] [ARG1: this recipe] and look forward to eating it when they come to our house for lunch on sundays after church i do some preparation for this recipe before leaving for church on sunday morning and finish it after church that is why we call it sunday paella
